ygData.subject: Re: Bard Equipment Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm... I thought the Catliff was indifferent to everyone.  Due to the quest he gives.  I ve camped in the secret room a fair amount and have never seen him
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm... I thought the Catliff was indifferent to everyone. Due to the quest he gives. I've camped in the
secret room a fair amount and have never seen him unfortunately.

Laluni Songhammer of E'Ci

JasonF wrote:

> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
> > > the Crested Helm,
> >
> > Very rare drop, you'll probably see 10 spaulders before the helm.
> > This is a most sought after item, even by higher level people.
> > The Caitliff in MM drops this, but he is an uncommon spawn, with
> > a rare helm drop which equals hours and hours or camping unless
> > you get lucky on the first few shots.
> >
>
> Wow! I guess I didn't know how lucky I was when I got mine then! I was
> camping the secret room off of the Mistmoore Graveyard for my Black Silk
> Gloves and experience when the Caitliff just sauntered in and we killed him.
> He had the helm and I won the roll and have been wearing it ever since: AC
> 10, STR 6, CHA 3, Weight 5.0. Good bardic stuff.
>
> Crier
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.

--
Steven S. Klug
sklug@...
